mapper.select: select count(*) from chat_logs where chat_rooms = ${seq}

select * from (select chat_rooms,writer,txt,write_date, row_number() over(order by write_date asc) ranks,members.nickname writernickname from chat_logs join members on chat_logs.writer = members.code where chat_rooms = ${seq}) where ranks between #{endPost} and #{startPost} order by ranks desc
